dct_title_s: A map of the province of Upper Canada: describing all the new settlements, townships, & cc. with the countries adjacent, from Quebec to Lake Huron, compiled from the original documents in the Surveyor general's office.; Upper Canada
dct_description_sm: Prime meridian: Greenwich. Shows districts and townships in Upper Canada, New York and Vermont, and roads and rivers in the lower peninsula of Michigan. 1 map mounted: hand col.; 55 x 84 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
